chapters.title: Prologue: Snow
chapters.info: Lini Eltring, p. 33 (23)—Childhood nurse to Maighdin, Morgase, and Elayne Trakand. She has many wise sayings, which Elayne and Morgase are fond of quoting to themselves and others (probably because they have been ingrained into their minds so much). She went with Morgase when she fled Andor to Amadicia, and now serves as Faile's chief maid. See also t'Aybara, Faile ni Bashere; Dorlain, Maighdin; Trakand, Elayne; Trakand, Morgase.
